content.text: Hi there, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to play video games, I'm also an avid soccer player. What about you?
I'm trying to find a sport that will help me improve my physical and mental strength. I also like to play guitar and write songs.
That's cool! I used to only play covers, but now I write my own songs too. What's your favorite genre to play?
I like to play a lot of different genres, but I really love playing blues and rock.
Me too! I also like to play some rap and hip hop.
That's cool! Do you have any favorite artists?
I love Chance the Rapper, Kendrick Lamar, and J. Cole.
Those are all great artists! I love their music too.
What do you think about the new Dreamworks movie, Abominable?
I thought it was great! The animation was beautiful and the story was really touching.
I agree! I thought the animation was some of the best I've seen in a while.
Yeah, it was really impressive. I'm glad you liked it too!
